column2: Motivation: Why are you doing this AI assessment?
column5: External Pressure – We are responding to external hype or competitor moves without a clear internal goal.
column6: Resource Optimization – We want to identify where AI can reduce costs or automate repetitive manual tasks.
column7: Strategic Clarity – We need a professional roadmap to align AI initiatives with our core business objectives.
column8: Readiness Check – We aim to evaluate our technical infrastructure and workforce skills for upcoming scaling.
column9: Competitive Advantage – We are seeking to define a market-leading position through high-impact AI innovation.

column2: Which business challenge is your top priority?
How is AI influencing your organization’s strategy?
column5: No Impact – We have not assessed AI trends and have no documented strategy regarding them.
column6: Reactive – We acknowledge the trend but only respond to external pressures on an ad-hoc basis.
column7: Exploratory – We monitor trends and have initiated pilot projects to address specific needs.
column8: Strategic – AI is a key planning driver with a formal roadmap for systematic integration.
column9: Innovative – We leverage AI to redefine our business model and set industry standards.

column2: Who is the primary driver of AI  within your organization? (Select all that apply)
Responsibility: Are you in charge of AI initiatives?
